news.title: Anti-immigrant material among AI-generated content getting billions of views on TikTok
news.summary: Researchers uncovered 354 AI-focused accounts that had accumulated 4.5bn views in a month. Hundreds of accounts on TikTok are garnering billions of views by pumping out AI-generated content.

news.title: YouTube says it will comply with Australia’s under-16s social media ban, with Lemon8 to also restrict access
news.summary: YouTube will comply with the federal government’s under-16s social media ban. But its parent company Google has warned the laws ‘won’t keep teens safer online’ The communications minister, Anika Wells, said YouTube had a responsibility to keep its platform safe.

news.title: Tesla privately warned UK that weakening EV rules would hit sales
news.summary: Elon Musk-owned electric carmaker also called for support for the secondhand market, documents reveal. Tesla privately warned the UK government that weakening electric vehicle rules would hit battery car sales.

news.title: Sleep Awake review – Gary Numan cameos in an overly straightforward sleep-deprivation horror
news.summary: Psychedelic visuals and a promising premise are let down by tired game design. First-person horror with an appearance from the synthpop pioneer Gary Numan.
